coded_answer.p: Thank you, it'sit was great to hear for about my winningprize. You ask me for some informationsinformation - here theyit areis.

First I can do the travel only in July, because I can't get any freetimefree time in any other month. The next thing is, that I would prefer a log cabinecabin. I don't want to sleep in a tent, because I'm afraid of snakes and similar animals.

About the activities duringat the Campcamp, I can tell you, that I like to play Tennistennis and I doplay it very goodwell. Another thing I want to try, if possible, is to play Golfgolf. It's a very favouritepopular sport also in our region (area)in our region (area) also, but I didhave never found time to do it. I'm a beginner inat Golfgolf you have to know.

Now a question from me to you: Isis it possible to pay for the different things withby credit-cardcredit card? Another question - what sortssort of clothes shall I bring with me? Is July a hot and dry month or isdoes it rainingrain sometimes?
I think, this will be all I want to know. If there isare any other questionquestions fromon your part, please call me or write again.
I'm looking forward to hearhearing from you,
sorrySorry, I'm late I know, but now I will tell you something about my experience last month.

The concert started on the 15th of mayMay and it was a realreally great session in our valley. I was so happy when they toldasked me to help them with the organisation. I was responsible tofor the advertismentsadvertisements and I had alsoalso had to invite the "important personspeople" from our governementgovernment. It was realyreally a new job for me, but I think, I have donedid goodwell. I've learned a lot about management and especially - how stars are livinglive.
One evening we went allall went together out for dinerdinner and after we visitedwent to oura new disco. We arrived at home early in the morning - it was great.
Now Kim, I will finish my letter but I promise you to write again as soon as possible, maybe. Maybe if I've developed the photos of the concert and the stars and the ....
A good idea at least - you come here and I tellwill tell you some other story'sstories.
In the meanwhileIn the meantime enjoy your life -
